signToAuthenticate.message: Welcome to Devcash Bounty Platform! For your security, please sign the message to confirm your account.

heroSection.paragraph: Join our global community of blockchain developers and make the most of your skills.

whatIsSection.paragraph: Devcash (DEV) is cash for the developer economy. It is the official currency of Blockchain Developers United. Devcash offers various services such as a bounty platform and a decentralize exchange to make developers’ jobs easier.

IBOSection.paragraph: Initial bounty offering, or IBO in short, is inspired by ICO. Instead of money, you put your skills and time to build awesome things to get Devcash.  The IBO will be powered by Devcash Bounty Platform.

bountyPlatformSection.paragraph: The Devcash bounty platform is a decentralized bounty platform where users utilize DEV to crowdsource developer talent or perform developer tasks and earn DEV.
bountyPlatformSection.postBountyParagraph: Post a task, crowdsource developer talent.

dexSection.paragraph: The Devcash DEX is a decentralized exchange with an ETH/DEV market. It is fully automated on Ethereum smart contracts and offers zero-fee trading.

startExploringSection.paragraph: Start exploring Devcash bounty platform and join our global community of developers. Earn DEV using your skills or crowdsource developer talent.

explore.cardParagraph: Devcash Bounty Platform is a decentralized bounty platform where users can post or hunt bounties.  You can explore the bounties below.

post.cardParagraph: Enter the details of your bounty below to create it.
post.bountyTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your bounty
post.bountyDescriptionPlaceholder:
Enter the description of your bounty.
You can use  **Markdown** to format the text.

Example:
# Bounty Scope
Explanation of the **scope** of the bounty...

## Requirements
Explanation of the requirements to complete the bounty...
1. Requirement 1
2. Requirement 2
post.bountyTypeHunterAddressPlaceholder: Enter the address of the hunter
post.bountyAmountEachPlaceholder: Enter the amount for each bounty
post.contactNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of the contact
post.contactEmailPlaceholder: Enter the email of the contact
post.titleLengthError: Title must be between %1 and %2 characters.
post.contactNameLengthError: Contact name must be between %1 and %2 characters.
post.numBountiesError: You must specify a value between 1 and 255.
post.deadlineError: Deadline cannot be a past date.
post.needCategoryError: You need to pick a category.

bountyPosted.paragraph: It'll become visible after it is confirmed by the network. This might take 15-30 minutes, you can view this transaction [here](https://etherscan.io/tx/%1) In the mean time, you can post another bounty by clicking the button below.

manager.bountyPersonalCreated: You've created a personal bounty called 1%.
manager.submissionApproved: You've approved a submission sent to 1%.
manager.submissionRejected: You've rejected a submission sent to 1%.
manager.bountyAwarded: You've sent a bounty award for 1%.

hunter.bountyPersonalCreated: A personal bounty called 1% has been created for you.
hunter.submissionApproved: Your submission to 1% has been approved.
hunter.submissionRejected: Your submission to 1% has been rejected.
hunter.bountyAwarded: You've received a bounty award for 1%.

general.bountyPersonalCreated: The personal bounty has been created.
general.bountyAwarded: A bounty award of 1% has been given.
general.bountyReclaimed: The funds for the bounty has been reclaimed.

bountyHunter.noSubmissionsSent: You didn't send any submissions yet.
bountyHunter.noPersonalBounties: You don't have any personal bounties yet.

bountyManager.noSubmissionsReceived: You didn't receive any submissions yet.
bountyManager.noYourBounties: You didn't post any bounties yet.

confirmToApprove.paragraph: Please confirm that you would like to send the bounty prize to the hunter.

confirmToReject.paragraph: Please confirm that you would like to reject the submission.

inputFeedback.placeholder: Write your feedback for the submission here...

postBounty.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to post this bounty. It might take 15-30 minutes for the bounty to become visible.
postBounty.placeholderParagraph1: You can explain your bounty here.
postBounty.placeholderParagraph2: What do you want hunters of this bounty to do?
postBounty.placeholderParagraph3: You can also use markdown shortcuts such as #, ##, *, ** etc.
postBounty.placeholderParagraph4: What do hunters need to do for you to approve their submission?

createSubmission.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to create this submission. It might take 15-30 minutes for the submission to become visible.
createSubmission.placeholderParagraph1: You can write your submission here.
createSubmission.placeholderParagraph2: You can also use markdown shortcuts such as #, ##, *, ** etc.

confirmToApprove.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to approve this submission. It might take 15-30 minutes for it to be processed by the network.

confirmToReject.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to reject this submission. It might take 15-30 minutes for it to be processed by the network.

approveAmount.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to approve the amount. It might take 15-30 minutes for it to be processed by the network.

verifyToSignIn.paragraph: Verify your address via your wallet to sign in. If you have verified before, please wait for the process to complete.

reclaim.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to reclaim the funds. It might take 15-30 minutes for it to be processed by the network.

contribute.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to contribute to the bounty. It might take 15-30 minutes for it to be processed by the network.

generic.paragraph: Please confirm the transaction via your wallet to continue.

sidebarContextual.paragraphApproveBalance: The approved balance can be used on the bounty platform to post bounties.

submission.cardParagraph: Enter the details of your submission below.
submission.descriptionPlaceholder:
Enter the description of your submission here.
You can use  **Markdown** to format the text.

Example:
# Description
Description of the **submission**...

contribute.cardParagraph: Pick or enter an amount to contribute.
contribute.cardParagraphSecondary: Copy or scan the address to contribute.
contribute.paragraphAddressCopiedBounty: The bounty address has been copied to your clipboard.
contribute.paragraphAddressCopied: The address has been copied to your clipboard.

signInCard.paragraphSignInToContinue: To use all the features of the Devcash Bounty Platform, you need to sign in with MetaMask, Authereum or Portis.
signInCard.paragraphSignIn: Sign in using MetaMask, Authereum or Portis.

notification.approvalDescription: Your approved balance will update once its confirmed on the network.
notification.personalBountyTitle: A personal bounty "%1" has been created for you
notification.submissionCreatedDescription: It will be visible to the bounty creator after its confirmed on the network.
notification.submissionRejectedApprovedDescription: Your feedback will be visible to the bounty hunter after its confirmed on the network.
notification.submissionReceivedTitle: Your bounty "%1" has received a new submission
notification.yourSubmissionApprovedTitle: Your submission for bounty "%1" has been approved!
notification.yourSubmissionRejectedTitle: Your submission for bounty "%1" has been rejected!
notification.unknownNetworkDescription: Devcash runs on "mainnet", ensure your network settings in your wallet are correct.
notification.reclaimDescription: Your funds will be reclaimed once it's confirmed on the network.
notification.contributeFinishedDescription: Any approved submissions will be rewarded your contribution.

errors.reclaimFailedDesc: Your reclaim request failed, if the issue persists please contact the platform maintainer.

errorPage.404paragraph: The page you're looking for does not exist.
errorPage.genericParagraph: An error has occured on this page.

home.pageTitle: Devcash | Cash for the Developer Economy
home.pageDescription: Devcash (DEV) is cash for the developer economy. It is the official currency of Blockchain Developers United. Devcash offers various services such as a bounty platform and a decentralize exchange to make developers’ jobs easier.

bountyPlatform.pageDescription: Devcash Bounty Platform is a decentralized bounty platform where users utilize DEV to crowdsource developer talent or perform developer tasks and earn DEV.

overview.pageDescription: An overview of your activity on the Devcash Bounty Platform.

bountyManager.pageDescription: Manage the bounties you posted on the Devcash Bounty Platform.

bountyHunter.pageDescription: Manage the bounties you're hunting on the Devcash Bounty Platform.

post.pageDescription: Crowdsource developer talent by posting a bounty on the Devcash Bounty Platform.

error.pageDescription: Oops! An error has occurred on this page.
